attributes.action: Stop The RBS fat cat bosses recieving huge bonuses for underperforming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A BONUS is a financial thank you for performing above and beyond what is expected. Yet the board room of rbs think they deserve lottery winning bonuses for adding to the current financial meltdown. Bonuses are acceptable when performing but not for failing. This is like giving sweets to a child for misbehaving.Any profits should go to the treasury as it is now mainly a tax payer owned company. Nationally owned industry should keep taxes down, it shouldn't put them up to pay bonuses and bail outs

government_responses.details:
